feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:27 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:27 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
